slide.title: The charred body of a cop lies next to a burning bus at Banglamotor in the capital last night while fire fighters try to douse the blaze. The vehicle, requisitioned by police, was set afire by unidentified people. Photo: Star/ Courtesy
Another policeman and the civilian driver, both injured in the arson, are admitted to DMCH. Photo: Star/ Courtesy
A truck carrying 26 cows caught fire as pro-blockade activists hurled a petrol bomb in Faujdarhat area of Chittagong early yesterday. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das
The burning vehicle rammed a furniture market, which too caught fire. The driver and the helper suffered severe burns. Seven cows, helpless and trapped, perished in the fire. Photo: Anurup Kanti Das
